adminPage.noChurch: No churches found.  Please search for a different name.
adminPage.noUserChurches: This user has no churches associated with their account.
adminPage.noUsers: No users found. Please search for a different name or email.
adminPage.noteFour: Comparable software is ProPresenter.  It's $399 for a site license.  I made assumptions that the average church installs the software on 3 computers and divided our total installs by 3 to get the number of churches.  I also made the assumption that churches will upgrade to a newer version every 5 years on average.  So $399 / 5 years / 3 computers = $26.60 annual cost per computer.  If we can quantify these assumptions we should update this number.
adminPage.noteOne: Comparable software is Breeze.  They charge $72/mo or $864/year.
adminPage.noteThree: Comparable content is Orange.  They charge $1023/year for churches with 26-50 viewers for 252 Basic.
adminPage.noteTwo: Comparable software is SubSplash.  They start at $99/mo or $1200/year.  This does not include the cut they take on donations.
adminPage.subtitle: Manage server-wide settings and churches
adminPage.valueNotes: Notes on How Values are Calculated
